title: About Me
mainDescription: A developer and entrepreneur bridging mathematics doctoral background with software architecture, specialized in microservice infrastructures and artificial intelligence integrations.
detailedDescription: I began my academic career in mathematics and deepened my algorithm development and problem-solving skills during my doctoral studies. This strong mathematical foundation enables me to solve complex problems with systematic approaches in my software development processes.

In recent years, I've focused on microservice architectures, scalable backend systems, and artificial intelligence integrations. In projects like NexFit, NexPanel, and Atlas AI, I develop solutions that emphasize both technical depth and user experience.

My goal is to create products that can be effective on a global scale, technically sound, and fully meet user needs. I focus on transforming the experiences I learn from each project into bigger solutions in the next step.
